items.name: Blood Strike
implicitMods: 23% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
explicitMods: Adds 2 to 7 Cold Damage
37% increased Critical Strike Chance
+44% to Fire Resistance
0.22% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Gain 4 Life per Enemy Killed

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that increases the movement speed, attack speed and cast speed of you and your allies.
explicitMods: +1.8 metres to radius
You and nearby allies gain 16% increased Movement Speed
You and nearby allies gain 24% increased Cast Speed
You and nearby allies gain 24% increased Attack Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Base duration is 4.00 seconds
Modifiers to Buff Duration also apply to this Skill's Soul Gain Prevention
+1.8 metres to radius
You and nearby allies gain 20% increased Movement Speed
You and nearby allies gain 30% increased Cast Speed
You and nearby allies gain 31% increased Attack Speed

items.name: Shaper's Touch
explicitMods: 90% increased Armour and Energy Shield
+4 Accuracy Rating per 2 Intelligence
+1 Life per 4 Dexterity
+1 Mana per 4 Strength
1% increased Energy Shield per 10 Strength
2% increased Evasion Rating per 10 Intelligence
2% increased Melee Physical Damage per 10 Dexterity
flavourText: By my hand, the inert is given life.
By my hand, that which rots is reborn.
There is nothing that cannot be changed.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants elemental resistances and elemental ailment immunity to you and your allies.
explicitMods: +1.9 metres to radius
You and nearby allies gain +34% to all Elemental Resistances
You and nearby allies are Immune to all Elemental Ailments

items.name: Aegis Aurora
explicitMods: 313% increased Armour and Energy Shield
+10% to all Elemental Resistances
+5% to maximum Cold Resistance
+6% Chance to Block
Recover Energy Shield equal to 2% of Armour when you Block

the aurora evokes both awe and power.

items.name: Perquil's Toe
explicitMods: +49 to Dexterity
8% increased Movement Speed
Lightning Damage of Enemies Hitting you is Lucky
Nearby Allies' Damage with Hits is Lucky
flavourText: He was a lot luckier before he lost this.

items.name: Behemoth Bauble
explicitMods: 5% chance to receive additional Weapons when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
Heist Chests have a 4% chance to Duplicate contained Basic Currency
12% chance in Heists for Orbs of Alteration to drop as Chaos Orbs instead
1% chance in Heists for Items to drop fully linked

items.name: Vortex Grip
explicitMods: Grants Level 20 Aspect of the Spider Skill
+139 to Evasion Rating
+42 to maximum Energy Shield
+77 to maximum Mana
+45% to Fire Resistance
Non-Channelling Skills have -6 to Total Mana Cost

items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Has 2 Sockets
Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
7% increased Attack Speed
+50 to maximum Life
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.
